title: On The Ground In Gaza
teaser: NPR's Emily Harris joins us from Gaza City to discuss the fighting and what people there are thinking.
contentencoded:
Secretary of State John Kerry is in Cairo, hoping to broker a peace deal between Israel and Hamas. Meanwhile, Israel’s ground offensive into Gaza continues, and has resulted in a mounting Palestinian death toll and the capture of an Israeli soldier.

NPR’s Emily Harris joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson from Gaza to discuss what people are thinking, and the fighting both in the tunnels and above ground.

Guest

  • Emily Harris, NPR international correspondent, based in Jerusalem. She tweets @emilygharris.
